metadata.title: Youfui Home Decor Pot, Pig Succulent Planter Flowerpot Decor for Home Office Desk (4pcs Pigs)
features: Versatile Pigs: Makes your room full of vigour. Perfect for holding succulent, herbs and catus plants, also can holding pens and sugars on desk. Rose Pig, Thinking Pig, Couple Pig, Father and son Pig.
Indoor and Garden Decor: Handmade Distinctive. Ideal for office,desk,bookshelf,dinning table,living room,hosting room and everywhere
Drain hole with Stopper: Each planter is equipped with a hole at the bottom to allow draining

Gift Choice: Creative presents in great price. Funny ornament for whom like gardening. Attractive planter,makes your desk unique. Great gift for Kids, Girlfriend,Colleague,Classmates and so on. Birthday Gifts, Mother's Day Gift, Valentine's Gift,Student Gifts, Christmas Gifts(Plant is not included).
Package contents: 4pcs of pig flowerpots. Succulent planter for pig lovers. If you want to consult, please contact us anytime.
description: - Modern Decorative Small Resin Succulent Plant Pot, Planter for Succulent Plants, Small Cactus and Herbs
- Drain pot is suitable for plant growth, and the bottom hole is suitable for plant drainage, with a stopper, can add and change fresh water for plants.
-Resin materials is not fragiled so easily, makes your little garden unique.

-4pcs Pigs pot, Rose Pig, Thinking Pig, Couple Pig, Father and son Pig. Fits for friends and kids as gift. Looks like a pig with feeding pot, waiting for there food. So you can put any plants in it as you like
-Handmade products. Made of high quality Resin
-Eco friendly, no chemical smell and safety
-Pay attention to the product size, do not buy large plants, so as not to be inappropriate
